sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with han yin 寒飲 , cold drink. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 42: 妊娠腹滿者， 由腹內宿有寒冷停飲，挾以妊娠，重因觸冷，則冷飲發動 , “When a pregnant woman has a feeling of abdominal fullness, this is because cold beverages have stayed in her abdomen for an extended period of time. If in addition to the pregnancy, there is yet another exposure to cold, cold rheum will be activated [to cause the feeling of fullness]”.
②Designation of cold beverages, and of the consumption of such beverages. Su wen 素問 35: 頭痛如破，渴欲冷飲 , “His head aches as if it [were about to] burst. He is thirsty and longs for cold beverages ”.
